alert.note: Alert for Day; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:55PM MDT until June 24 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Traverse County in west central Minnesota... Northern Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Day County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1054 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Victor to near Lake Traverse Housing Units to near Agency Village, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rosholt and Victor around 1100 PM CDT. Rainbow Island and Traverse Country Park around 1105 PM CDT. Halls Landing, Lake Traverse and Whiterock Colony around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Silver Bridge, Yankeetown, Beardsley, Mud Lake Landing, Wheaton, Immanuel Church, Dumont, Barry, Siloah Country Church, Tintah and Big Stone Colony. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
